column1: Will be visiting Sedona for thanksgiving, but wondering if we should bring our dog. Dis anyone local know how much of s problem (if any) valley fever is for dogs? I think the epidemic is mostly down in phoenix.
Sorry for double post! Didn't think the first one was successful!
